summary: Comprehensive testing of SunoLegal waitlist features completed. All major features working correctly including popup modal centering, user/lawyer form submissions to database, footer navigation with scroll-to-top, mobile menu, and Google Form fallback links.

ui_bugs.issue: Tab switching in popup modal requires JavaScript click (force=True) due to overlay interception. Standard click events are blocked by the popup overlay div.
ui_bugs.workaround: Use JavaScript click or force=True - functionality works correctly

passed_tests: Backend health check returns healthy status
POST /api/waitlist - User waitlist submission saves to database successfully
POST /api/waitlist - Duplicate email returns 'already on waitlist' message
GET /api/waitlist/count - Returns correct count
POST /api/lawyer-interest - Lawyer interest submission saves to database successfully
POST /api/lawyer-interest - Duplicate email returns 'already registered' message
GET /api/lawyer-interest/count - Returns correct count
GET /api/lawyers/list - Returns lawyer data
Waitlist popup modal appears on homepage after 2-second delay
Waitlist popup modal is properly centered (center at 960px on 1920px viewport)
Popup has Users and Lawyers tabs
User waitlist form submission via popup shows success message 'You're on the list!'
User waitlist form submission shows toast 'Welcome to the waitlist!'
Lawyer interest form submission via /waitlist page shows success message 'Thank you!'
Lawyer interest form submission shows toast 'Thank you for your interest!'
/waitlist page loads with tabs for Users and Lawyers
Footer link navigation scrolls to top of page after clicking
Mobile menu button visible on mobile viewport
Mobile menu opens when hamburger button clicked
Mobile navigation links work correctly
Mobile menu closes after navigation
Mobile menu closes when X button clicked
Google Form links have target='_blank' (open in new tab)
Google Form URLs are correct for both Users and Lawyers forms
